name: Whirl
description:
Whirl is a casual arcade game inspired by pinball and breakout. Rotate the world to change the direction of gravity. Destroy all the blocks to win the level. Earn more stars by destroying the blocks within the time limit.

Features:

  • 50 Unique Levels
  • Xbox controller support
  • 30+ Unique Music tracks
  • It’s FREE!

System Requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7+, Mac OS X 10.9+, Ubuntu 12.04+
  • RAM: 512 MB
  • VIDEO: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • CPU: SSE2 instruction set support

*NOTE: I don’t have a Mac or Linux machine to test the game, so performance on those platforms is uncertain. If you plan on playing Whirl specifically on Mac or Linux, I encourage you to download it for FREE and test it out first. Thanks!
